title: Can't connect To twitch no matter what
body: The thing keeps saying link unable...

replies.body: Hmmmm what kind of link were you trying to get working? I'm not actually sure what you're referencing but should be able to at least point you in the right direction.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GibMHAgA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-14T05:06:58.788+0000)
>
> Hmmmm what kind of link were you trying to get working? I'm not actually sure what you're referencing but should be able to at least point you in the right direction.

Totally a necro here, but i'm trying to link my twitch.tv to my league and its also not working. Its kind of frustrating, is there any way you guys could look into it?
"Riot link failed" I don't know if it'll be enough, but that'd be nice... Thanks.
I'm thinking that maybe it hasn't been updated with the recent rune changes.  I'm having the same problem now myself.

> [{quoted}](name=UrFutureKing,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GibMHAgA,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-17T21:52:37.648+0000)
>
> I'm thinking that maybe it hasn't been updated with the recent rune changes.  I'm having the same problem now myself.

Alright, hopefully they get it fixed.
not fixed... i have the same issue
What is this nonsense, can they not just fix it already??

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GibMHAgA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-14T05:06:58.788+0000)
>
> Hmmmm what kind of link were you trying to get working? I'm not actually sure what you're referencing but should be able to at least point you in the right direction.

~~Twitch.tv has a way to link your league of legends account to your twitch.tv account, using changing the name on one of your rune pages to a code that they send you. This functionality no longer works, and I think it is because the rune system was updated. I think the problem is on twitch.tv's end, because they didn't update their linking system to account for the changes to runes, so I don't think it's a LoL problem.~~

EDIT: I've just made a [reddit thread](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/7loeka/twitch_it_is_no_longer_possible_to_sort_lol/) that I think summarizes the situation. I think the fact that the LoL+Twitch account linking isn't working any more is related to the preseason runes change, and I think this is also why the Twitch option to sort LoL streams by rank no longer exists.
Please help i want to start streaming lol games!! it keeps saying riot link fail i have tried to link it multiple times and it still does not work.

> [{quoted}](name=chubchubcrow,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GibMHAgA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-01-24T18:50:19.727+0000)
>
> Please help i want to start streaming lol games!! it keeps saying riot link fail i have tried to link it multiple times and it still does not work.

You can stream without linking it.
I've had the same issues before the pre-season rework to the runes.
